snippet: A 41-day road from bracket pairings to a championship has drawn criticism from coaches.
abstract: College basketball coaches criticize new Division III postseason schedule announced by the NCAA, expressing particular apprehension about 15-day gap between semifinal games and the national championship.
lead_paragraph: A 41-day road from bracket pairings to a championship has drawn criticism from coaches.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Division III Basketball Tournament Will Be Lengthy
headline.main: Division III Postseason Changes Create Long Wait Until Championship Game
headline.print_headline: Division III Postseason Changes Create Long Wait Until Championship Game
